title: The Last Station Master, A Boy, A terrorist, A Secret, And Trouble
description: On his grandparents' remote North Carolina farm for the summer, Nate discovers there’s more happening on the rambling property than anyone realizes. To stop a terrorist’s plot and prevent a national disaster, he must unravel the mystery surrounding the old house, solve clues from a ghost, and become The Last Station Master.
author: S.A.M. Posey
